mapper.sql: c.line_id, a.factory_no, a.brand_no, a.division_no, a.store_no, a.workshop_no, a.group_no, a.schedule_no, a.start_date, a.end_date, a.material_no, a.bill_no, a.bill_type_no, a.work_order_type, a.size_type_no,c.size_no, c.size_qty,a.creator, a.create_time, a.modifier, a.modify_time,a.wcode, a.remarks,b.material_name,b.normal_unit
AND NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM bl_mo_hand AA WHERE AA.mo_no=C.bill_no AND AA.size_no=C.size_no)
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM bl_mo a left join bas_material b on a.material_no=b.material_no left join bl_mo_dtl c on a.bill_no =c.bill_no WHERE line_id = #{lineId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
SELECT COUNT(1) as s FROM bl_mo WHERE 1=1

SELECT
FROM bl_mo a left join bas_material b on a.material_no=b.material_no left join bl_mo_dtl c on a.bill_no =c.bill_no WHERE 1=1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bl_mo (line_id, factory_no, brand_no, division_no, store_no, workshop_no, group_no, planer, schedule_no, start_date, end_date, material_no, bill_no, bill_type_no, work_order_type, customer_type, mo_material_status, mo_process_status, mo_mo_status, size_type_no, size_no, size_qty, finish_qty, creator, create_time, modifier, modify_time, remarks) VALUES (#{lineId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{factoryNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{brandNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{divisionNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{storeNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{workshopNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{groupNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{planer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{scheduleNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{endDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{materialNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{billNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{billTypeNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{workOrderType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{moMaterialStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{moProcessStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{moMoStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sizeTypeNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sizeNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sizeQty,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{finishQty,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
UPDATE bl_mo
factory_no = #{factoryNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
brand_no = #{brandNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
division_no = #{divisionNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
store_no = #{storeNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
workshop_no = #{workshopNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
group_no = #{groupNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
planer = #{planer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
schedule_no = #{scheduleNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
start_date = #{startDate,jdbcType=DATE},
end_date = #{endDate,jdbcType=DATE},
material_no = #{materialNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bill_no = #{billNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bill_type_no = #{billTypeNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
work_order_type = #{workOrderType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
customer_type = #{customerType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mo_material_status = #{moMaterialStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mo_process_status = #{moProcessStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mo_mo_status = #{moMoStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
size_type_no = #{sizeTypeNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
size_no = #{sizeNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
size_qty = #{sizeQty,jdbcType=INTEGER},
finish_qty = #{finishQty,jdbcType=INTEGER},
creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modifier = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WHERE line_id = #{lineId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

UPDATE bl_mo SET factory_no = #{factoryNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, brand_no = #{brandNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, division_no = #{divisionNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, store_no = #{storeNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, workshop_no = #{workshopNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, group_no = #{groupNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, planer = #{planer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, schedule_no = #{scheduleNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_date = #{startDate,jdbcType=DATE}, end_date = #{endDate,jdbcType=DATE}, material_no = #{materialNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bill_no = #{billNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bill_type_no = #{billTypeNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, work_order_type = #{workOrderType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, customer_type = #{customerType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mo_material_status = #{moMaterialStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mo_process_status = #{moProcessStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mo_mo_status = #{moMoStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, size_type_no = #{sizeTypeNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, size_no = #{sizeNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, size_qty = #{sizeQty,jdbcType=INTEGER}, finish_qty = #{finishQty,jdbcType=INTEGER}, creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modifier = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE line_id = #{lineId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
